scripts.remake: yarn clean && yarn make && yarn build
scripts.prepublishOnly: cd base && yarn build:base && yarn format:base && yarn clean:deps
scripts.postinstall: cd base && node util/ffdl.js && node util/cprobe.js && shx chmod -R +x util/**/**
scripts.clean:deps: cd base && node util/clean/deps.mjs && node util/clean/ff.mjs
scripts.clean: yarn clean:deps && yarn clean:base && yarn clean:next && yarn clean:client && yarn clean:server
scripts.make: yarn make:base && yarn make:client && yarn make:next && yarn make:server
scripts.build:base: cd base && tsc -p config/cjs.json && tsc -p config/esm.json && tsc -p config/types.json
scripts.build: yarn build:base && yarn build:client && yarn build:next && yarn build:server && yarn format
scripts.format: yarn format:base && yarn format:client && yarn format:next && yarn format:server
scripts.test:cli: yarn link && yt-dlx audio-lowest --query PERSONAL BY PLAZA && yt-dlx al --query SuaeRys5tTc && yarn unlink
scripts.test: yarn test:scrape && yarn test:mix && yarn test:video && yarn test:audio && yarn test:command && yarn test:cli
